entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
